ValidationRule.description: Pre-Sales Req: 2327. No Two Cost Business Group Should be the same. Updated for Sprint 11, PreSales Req: 3459
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name <> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, IF( OR( ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c) && PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c <> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c ) && PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c <> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c ) && PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c) && PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c ) && PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c <> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c ) && PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c <> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c) && PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c) && PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c <> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_DAaaS__c) && PSR_Cost_BU_NE_DAaaS__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_EOP__c) && PSR_Cost_BU_NE_EOP__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c) && PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c<> 0 ), IF (OR( ( ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c) ) && (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c) , (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c == PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c ) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c ) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c ) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c ) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c == PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c ) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c ) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c ) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c == PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c ) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c == PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c ) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c == PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_DAaaS__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_EOP__c) )&& (PSR_Cost_BU_NE_DAaaS__c == PSR_Cost_BU_NE_EOP__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_EOP__c) ) && (PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c == PSR_Cost_BU_NE_EOP__c), (ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_DAaaS__c) || ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c) ) && (PSR_Cost_BU_NE_DAaaS__c == PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c) ),True , false ), False ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter the same amount for costs for different BGs or BUs
